name: Adit Rush
description:
Control your fear as you get trapped in an abandoned saw-mill to survive as long as possible.

YouTube Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0G_9UJRdZtc

Dev Blog: http://www.deweloper.de/category/adit-rush/

This game is designed for Oculus VR with a head-mounted Leap Motion controller.
